revision.comment: /* External links */ Google Code sites are dead, update Blasphemer link to github
revision.text:
{{doomwiki}} '''Blasphemer''' is a total conversion project for the [[Heretic]] engine intending to provide a full replacement [[IWAD]] under a {{wp|BSD_license|new BSD license}}. Blasphemer requires a limit-removing [[source port]] to work as its levels are not all compatible with vanilla Heretic.
The project is currently in alpha and mostly incomplete.
==External links== * [https://github.com/Blasphemer/blasphemer Official site] [[Category:Supported games]]
